mapper.select: SELECT TFC_ENF_ID , TFC_ENF_DT , ROAD_ADDR , lat , lng FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER ORDER BY TFC_ENF_DT DESC LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{start}

if.test: searchType == 'all' and searchTxt != '' and searchTxt != null

sql.if: AND (mtfm.TFC_ENF_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%') OR mtfm.VH_REG_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%') OR mvi.VIO_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%'))

if.test: searchType == 'enfNo' and searchTxt != '' and searchTxt != null
searchType == 'vhNo' and searchTxt != '' and searchTxt != null
searchType == 'name' and searchTxt != '' and searchTxt != null
sDate != null and sDate != '' and (eDate == null or eDate == '')
eDate != null and eDate != '' and (sDate == null or sDate == '')
eDate != null and eDate != '' and sDate != null and sDate != ''

mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY mtfm.TFC_ENF_DT) AS rnum , mtfm.TFC_ENF_ID , mtfm.VIO_ID , mtfm.TFC_ENF_DT , mtfm.ROAD_ADDR , mtfm.LAST_TFC_ENF_PROC_CD , mtfm.VH_REG_NO , mvi.VIO_NM , mfpi.PYMNT_STTS FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER mtfm LEFT JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO mvi ON mtfm.VIO_ID = mvi.VIO_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO mfni ON mtfm.TFC_ENF_ID = mfni.TFC_ENF_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO mfpi ON mfni.FINE_NTC_ID = mfpi.FINE_NTC_ID WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY rnum DESC LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "cnt" FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER mtfm LEFT JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO mvi ON mtfm.VIO_ID = mvi.VIO_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO mfni ON mtfm.TFC_ENF_ID = mfni.TFC_ENF_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO mfpi ON mfni.FINE_NTC_ID = mfpi.FINE_NTC_ID WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT temt.TFC_ENF_ID , temt.VIO_ID , temt.TFC_ENF_DT , temt.ROAD_ADDR , temt.LAST_TFC_ENF_PROC_CD , temt.TFC_ENF_DETAIL , temt.TFC_ENF_INFOIMAGE , temt.TFC_ENF_IMAGEPATH , temt.LNG , temt.LAT , temt.VH_REG_NO , temt.VH_TY , temt.TFC_ENF_TTL , temt.TFC_ENF_DETAIL , fpi.TOTAL_PRICE , fpi.PYMNT_STTS , mvi.VIO_NM , mvi.DVR_LCEN_ID , mvi.DVR_LCEN_TY , mvi.VIO_BRTH , mvi.VIO_PNO , mvi.VIO_EMAIL , mvi.VIO_ADDR , pit.POL_NM , pit.POL_DEPT_NM , mppi.PLACE_PYMNT_NM , mppi.PLACE_PYMNT_ID , tlfi.FINE_DESC , tlfi.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID , tlfi.TFC_LAW_ID , tlfi.FINE_PRICE FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER temt LEFT JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO mvi ON temt.VIO_ID = mvi.VIO_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_POL_INFO pit ON temt.POL_ID = pit.POL_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO mfni ON mfni.TFC_ENF_ID = temt.TFC_ENF_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO fpi ON mfni.FINE_NTC_ID = fpi.FINE_NTC_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_PL_PYMNT_INFO mppi ON fpi.PLACE_PYMNT_ID = mppi.PLACE_PYMNT_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_TFC_ENF_FINE_INFO mtefi ON temt.TFC_ENF_ID = mtefi.TFC_ENF_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_FINE_INFO tlfi ON mtefi.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID = tlfi.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_INFO tli ON tlfi.TFC_LAW_ID = tli.TFC_LAW_ID WHERE temt.TFC_ENF_ID = #{tfcEnfId}
SELECT ROAD_ADDR , LAT , LNG FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER ORDER BY CR_DT DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER ( TFC_ENF_ID, VIO_ID, POL_ID, TFC_ENF_DT, ROAD_ADDR, ROAD_LN, VH_REG_NO, VH_TY, SPD_LMT, VIO_SPD, OVER_SPD, LAST_TFC_ENF_PROC_CD, LAT, LNG, CR_DT, CRTR, TFC_ENF_TTL, TFC_ENF_DETAIL )VALUES( #{tfcEnfId}, #{vioId}, #{polId},
#{tfcEnfDt},
NOW(),
#{roadAddr}, #{roadLn}, #{vhRegNo}, #{vhTy}, #{spdLmt}, #{vioSpd}, #{overSpd}, #{lastTfcEnfProcCd}, #{lat}, #{lng}, NOW(), #{crtr}, #{tfcEnfTtl}, #{tfcEnfDetail} )
mapper.select: SELECT MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID , MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT , MTEM.ROAD_ADDR , MTEM.TFC_ENF_DETAIL , MTEM.LNG , MTEM.LAT , MTEM.VH_REG_NO , MTEM.VH_TY , MFPI.TOTAL_PRICE , MFPI.PYMNT_STTS , MVI.VIO_ID , MVI.VIO_NM , MVI.DVR_LCEN_ID , MVI.DVR_LCEN_TY , MVI.VIO_BRTH , MVI.VIO_PNO , MVI.VIO_EMAIL , MVI.VIO_SIGN_FILE_PATH , MPI.POL_NM , MPI.POL_DEPT_NM , MPPI.PLACE_PYMNT_NM FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO MVI ON MTEM.VIO_ID = MVI.VIO_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_POL_INFO MPI ON MTEM.POL_ID = MPI.POL_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO MFNI ON MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID = MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO MFPI ON MFNI.FINE_NTC_ID = MFPI.FINE_NTC_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_PL_PYMNT_INFO MPPI ON MPPI.PLACE_PYMNT_ID = MFPI.PLACE_PYMNT_ID WHERE MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID = #{tfcEnfId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM WHERE MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{tfcEnfId}, '%')

SELECT MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID , MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT , MTEM.VH_REG_NO , MFPI.PYMNT_STTS , FIL.TITLE , FIL.ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO MVI ON MTEM.VIO_ID = MVI.VIO_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO MFNI ON MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID = MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO MFPI ON MFNI.FINE_NTC_ID = MFPI.FINE_NTC_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID , count(*) AS ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(MCC.CD_NM ORDER BY MTLFI.FINE_PRICE), ',', 1) AS TITLE FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_FINE_INFO MTEFI INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_FINE_INFO MTLFI ON MTLFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_INFO MTLI ON MTLI.TFC_LAW_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD MCC ON MTLI.LAW_TYPE = MCC.CD_ID GROUP BY MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID ) FIL ON FIL.TFC_ENF_ID = MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID WHERE MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID = #{tfcEnfId} AND MVI.VIO_BRTH = #{vioBrth} AND MVI.DVR_LCEN_ID = #{dvrLcenId} AND MTEM.DEL_YN = #{delYn}

SELECT MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT , MTEM.VH_REG_NO , MTEM.ROAD_ADDR , MTEM.TFC_ENF_DETAIL , MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID , MVI.VIO_NM , MFNI.FIRST_FINE_NTC_DDLN , MFNI.FIRST_FINE_NTC_PRICE , MFNI.SECOND_FINE_NTC_DDLN , MFNI.SECOND_FINE_NTC_PRICE , MFNI.NTC_TY , MFPI.PYMNT_STTS , MFPI.TOTAL_PRICE , MFPI.PAYER_NM , MFPI.PYMNT_DT , MCC.CD_NM FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO MVI ON MTEM.VIO_ID = MVI.VIO_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO MFNI ON MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID = MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO MFPI ON MFNI.FINE_NTC_ID = MFPI.FINE_NTC_ID LEFT JOIN MOZ_CM_CD MCC ON MFPI.PYMNT_METHOD = MCC.CD_ID WHERE MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID = #{tfcEnfId} AND MVI.VIO_BRTH = #{vioBrth} AND MVI.DVR_LCEN_ID = #{dvrLcenId} AND MTEM.DEL_YN = #{delYn}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO MVI ON MTEM.VIO_ID = MVI.VIO_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO MFNI ON MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID = MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO MFPI ON MFNI.FINE_NTC_ID = MFPI.FINE_NTC_ID WHERE MVI.DVR_LCEN_ID = #{dvrLcenId} AND MVI.VIO_BRTH = #{vioBrth} AND MTEM.DEL_YN = #{delYn}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT) AS rnum , MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID , MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT , MTEM.VH_REG_NO , MFPI.PYMNT_STTS , FIL.TITLE , FIL.ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN MOZ_VIO_INFO MVI ON MTEM.VIO_ID = MVI.VIO_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_NTC_INFO MFNI ON MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID = MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_FINE_PYMNT_INFO MFPI ON MFNI.FINE_NTC_ID = MFPI.FINE_NTC_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID , count(*) AS ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(MCC.CD_NM ORDER BY MTLFI.FINE_PRICE), ',', 1) AS TITLE FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_FINE_INFO MTEFI INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_FINE_INFO MTLFI ON MTLFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_INFO MTLI ON MTLI.TFC_LAW_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD MCC ON MTLI.LAW_TYPE = MCC.CD_ID GROUP BY MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID ) FIL ON FIL.TFC_ENF_ID = MFNI.TFC_ENF_ID WHERE MVI.DVR_LCEN_ID = #{dvrLcenId} AND MVI.VIO_BRTH = #{vioBrth} AND MTEM.DEL_YN = #{delYn} ORDER BY rnum DESC LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID , MTEM.ROAD_ADDR , MTEM.LAT , MTEM.LNG , MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT , FIL.TITLE , FIL.ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN ( SELECT MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID , count(*) AS ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(MCC.CD_NM ORDER BY MTLFI.FINE_PRICE), ',', 1) AS TITLE FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_FINE_INFO MTEFI INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_FINE_INFO MTLFI ON MTLFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_INFO MTLI ON MTLI.TFC_LAW_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD MCC ON MTLI.LAW_TYPE = MCC.CD_ID GROUP BY MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID ) FIL ON FIL.TFC_ENF_ID = MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID
WHERE CURRENT_DATE() < MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT AND DEL_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT DESC

SELECT COUNT(MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID) FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM INNER JOIN ( SELECT MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID , count(*) AS ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(MCC.CD_NM ORDER BY MTLFI.FINE_PRICE), ',', 1) AS TITLE FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_FINE_INFO MTEFI INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_FINE_INFO MTLFI ON MTLFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_INFO MTLI ON MTLI.TFC_LAW_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD MCC ON MTLI.LAW_TYPE = MCC.CD_ID GROUP BY MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID ) FIL ON FIL.TFC_ENF_ID = MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID
WHERE CURRENT_DATE() < MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT AND DEL_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT DESC

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN MTEM.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "policeEnfCnt", SUM(CASE WHEN MTEM.TFC_ENF_EQP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "cameraEnfCnt" FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM WHERE MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.MONTH_DATE) AS "enfDtList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.SPEED_CNT) AS "speedCntList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.SIGNAL_CNT) AS "signalCntList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.DRUNK_CNT) AS "drunkCntList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.NONE_LICENSE_CNT) AS "noneLicenseCntList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.CENTER_LINE_CNT) AS "centerLineCntList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.CROSSWALK_CNT) AS "crosswalkCntList", JSON_ARRAYAGG(RESULT.SIDEWALK_CNT) AS "sidewalkCntList" FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE RESULT_MONTH AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS MONTH_DATE UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(MONTH_DATE, INTERVAL -1 MONTH) FROM RESULT_MONTH WHERE MONTH_DATE > DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL -11 MONTH) ) SELECT DATE_FORMAT(RM.MONTH_DATE, '%Y-%m') AS MONTH_DATE, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC000' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SPEED_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC001' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SIGNAL_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC002' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DRUNK_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC003' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NONE_LICENSE_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC004' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CENTER_LINE_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC005' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CROSSWALK_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN FIL.LAW_TYPE = 'LTC006' AND MTEM.DEL_YN = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SIDEWALK_CNT FROM RESULT_MONTH RM LEFT JOIN MOZ_TFC_ENF_MASTER MTEM ON DATE_FORMAT(RM.MONTH_DATE, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(MTEM.TFC_ENF_DT , '%Y-%m') LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID , count(*) AS ENF_FINE_INFO_CNT , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(MCC.CD_ID ORDER BY MTLFI.FINE_PRICE), ',', 1) AS LAW_TYPE FROM MOZ_TFC_ENF_FINE_INFO MTEFI INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_FINE_INFO MTLFI ON MTLFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_FINE_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_TFC_LW_INFO MTLI ON MTLI.TFC_LAW_ID = MTEFI.TFC_LAW_ID INNER JOIN MOZ_CM_CD MCC ON MTLI.LAW_TYPE = MCC.CD_ID GROUP BY MTEFI.TFC_ENF_ID ) FIL ON FIL.TFC_ENF_ID = MTEM.TFC_ENF_ID GROUP BY RM.MONTH_DATE ORDER BY RM.MONTH_DATE )RESULT
